DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate safety feasibility Endologix Fenestrated Stent Graft System endovascular repair juxtarenal pararenal aortic aneurysm .
DOC.brief_title: Feasibility Safety Study Endologix Fenestrated Stent Graft System
DOC.detailed_description: The Endologix Fenestrated Stent Graft System use study three component , list : 1 . Endologix unibody bifurcate stent graft 2 . Endologix fenestrated proximal extension stent graft 3 . Endologix renal stent graft
DOC.criteria: Adequate iliac/femoral access compatible require delivery system Nonaneurysmal infrarenal aortic neck < 15mm length Most caudal renal artery aortoiliac bifurcation length > = 70 SMA aortoiliac bifurcation length > =90mm Proximal nonaneurysmal aortic neck SMA diameter 18 34 mm , length > =15mm angle < =60° aneurysm sac Angle < =60° ( clock face ) SMA CA Renal artery SMA < =35mm within 30mm axially , 4 8mm lumen diameter , clockface angle 90° 210° Common iliac artery distal fixation site : distal fixation length > =15mm , diameter > =10 mm < =23 mm angle < =90° aortic bifurcation Ability preserve least one hypogastric artery Life expectancy < 2 year judge investigator Psychiatric condition may interfere study Participating enrollment 30day followup phase another clinical study Known allergy device component Coagulopathy uncontrolled bleed disorder Contraindication contrast medium anticoagulant Ruptured , leaking , mycotic aneurysm Aortic dissection Serum creatinine ( SCr ) level > 2.0 mg/dL Traumatic vascular injury Active systemic localize groin infection Connective tissue disease ( e.g. , Marfan 's Syndrome ) Recent ( within prior three month ) cerebrovascular accident Recent ( within prior three month ) myocardial infarction Prior renal transplant Length either renal artery stented < 12mm Significant occlusive disease calcification either renal artery ( > 70 % ) An essential accessory renal artery Indispensable inferior mesenteric artery Untreated aneurysmal disease descend thoracic aorta Clinically significant mural thrombus circumferentially suprarenal segment Prior iliac artery stent implant may interfere delivery system introduction Unsuitable vascular anatomy Pregnancy
